doc:
Joan Barry (American actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Barry_(American_actress) 0 Joan Barry was an American actress best known for winning a paternity suit in California in 1943 against Charlie Chaplin after an affair between the two resulted in two terminated pregnancies and the subject of the suit, a live-born girl named Carol Ann. Chaplin supported the girl financially until her 21st birthday. Joan_Barry was an_American_actress best_known for winning a_paternity_suit in California in 1943 against Charlie_Chaplin after an_affair between the_two resulted in two_terminated_pregnancies and the_subject of the_suit , a_live-born_girl named Carol_Ann . Chaplin supported the_girl financially until her_21st_birthday .
